definition: shampoo (loanword)/see 洗髮皂|洗发皂[xi3 fa4 zao4]
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
Mt Yarla Shampo, in Dawu County 道孚縣|道孚县[Dao4 fu2 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
pinyin: Ya3 la1 Xiang1 bo1 shen2 shan1

definition: Mt Yarla Shampo, in Dawu County 道孚縣|道孚县[Dao4 fu2 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
pinyin: Ya3 la1 Xiang1 bo1 xue3 shan1

sentences.english: I bought a spray shampoo in a pet shop.
sentences.chinese: 我在小動物商店買了一瓶噴霧式香波。

sentences.english: Although not marketed for veterinary use, ketoconazole shampoos would be expected to be very effective.
sentences.chinese: 儘管沒有市售的獸用產品，酮康唑香波必定會很有效。

sentences.english: Shampoos , bubble baths and shower preparations with silk luster effect.
sentences.chinese: 用於具有絲光光澤效果的香波，泡沫浴和淋浴製品。

sentences.english: Hair should be shampooed daily, and rinsed fully.
sentences.chinese: 頭髮應該每天用洗髮香波洗，並充分沖洗。

sentences.english: The perfect alternative to baby soaps that contain harsh lathering agents and paraben preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 是含有起泡劑和防腐劑兒童香波的完美替代品。

sentences.english: Women keep three different shampoos in the shower。
sentences.chinese: 通常，女人的浴室裏總放着3種不同的洗髮香波。

sentences.english: Include a new toothbrush, travel size shampoo, conditioner, and body lotion.
sentences.chinese: 包括一個新牙刷，旅行香波，護髮素和護膚液。

sentences.english: Shampoo and body lotions are also used to wash our hair and body.
sentences.chinese: 我們也用香波和沐浴露清潔頭髮和身體。

sentences.english: GG:How many shampoos do you have?
sentences.chinese: 你一共有幾瓶洗髮香波？

sentences.english: It either has to be absorbed or shampooed out.
sentences.chinese: 它要麼應該被吸收，或者被香波洗掉。

sentences.english: The shampoo smelled really good that I asked my friend where she bought it so I could get one also.
sentences.chinese: 香波的味道很好聞，我就問那個朋友在哪兒買的。

sentences.english: Transparent hair shampoo was prepared using poly siloxane quaternary ammonium salt microemulsion as a conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 以聚硅氧烷季銨鹽微乳液爲調理劑製備透明洗髮香波。
用抗真菌香波給他洗澡。

sentences.english: Function as excellent antidandruff and antipruritic agent in shampoo system.
sentences.chinese: 在洗髮香波中有優越的去屑止癢作用。

sentences.english: Compound ketoconazole pet shampoo was preparationed by cold admixture.
sentences.chinese: 採用冷混合法製備寵物用複方酮康唑香波。

sentences.english: So how does your shampoo measure up?
sentences.chinese: 好了，現在如何來衡量你的香波呢？

definition: shower puff/bath sponge/bath ball (containing aromas or salts)
